amendment.description: An amendment numbered 63 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to reduce the salary of the Special Assistant to the Director of Programming at Voice of America to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burchett amendment (A037) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 260 (Roll no. 487).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Burchett amendment (A037) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 260 (Roll no. 487).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
